name: TextDrawFont
tips: If you want to change the font of a textdraw that is already shown, you don't have to recreate it. Simply use TextDrawShowForPlayer/TextDrawShowForAll after modifying the textdraw and the change will be visible.

params_body.name: font
params_body.description:
There are four font styles as shown below. Font value 4 specifies that this is a txd sprite; 5 specifies that this textdraw can display preview models. A font value greater than 5 does not display, and anything greater than 16 crashes the client.

Available Fonts:

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
